alert.note: Alert for Marathon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marathon County through 1000 PM CDT... At 915 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Rib Mountain, or 8 miles west of Wausau, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wausau, Weston, Rib Mountain, Rothschild, Schofield, Marathon City, Rib Falls, Sunset, Camp Phillips Scout Camp and Little Chicago. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
